title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Learn About the Park                   History & Culture               Photos & Multimedia               Online Exhibits & Artifacts               Kids & Youth               Nature               Get Social! Follow us online             Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.                        Harry S Truman Historic District National Historic Landmark   585 Photos  Maps and images of the features within Harry S Truman Historic District National Historic Landmark as they appeared in 2011 when the original 1971 historic district was expanded. This was the first historic district designated due to its association with an individual rather than an event or architectural elements. Nevertheless, the 1971 boundary excluded several significant properties. In 2011, the boundary was expanded to encompass more of the president's neighborhood and the commercial area of town. NOTE: All photographs were taken from the public right-of-way; consequently, some outbuildings are difficult to see.          Truman Home    7 Photos  Images of the Truman Home          Truman Home Press Photos   20 Photos  Interior and exterior images of the Truman Home are available for download.            Truman Home Interior (First Floor)   11 Photos  First-floor rooms          Truman Home Interior (Second Floor)   21 Photos  Historic American Buildings Survey (HABS) photos of the second floor interior of the Truman Home.          Truman Farm   21 Photos  Truman Family Farm in Grandview, Missouri
